mapper.insert: insert into tjut_reservation.meeting(name, creator, room_id, date, start_time, end_time, content) VALUES(#{name}, #{openid}, #{roomId}, #{date}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{content})
mapper.select: select id, name, creator, room_id AS roomId, date, start_time AS startTime, end_time AS endTime, content from tjut_reservation.meeting where date = #{date};
select id, name, date, time, remark from tjut_reservation.meeting_room where id = #{id};
